properties.displayName: MDE Alert - 'Packunwan' unwanted software was prevented
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection"
| extend ep=parse_json(ExtendedProperties)
| extend MitreTechnique = ep.["MitreTechniques"]
| where AlertName == "'Packunwan' unwanted software was prevented"
| where MitreTechnique == "T1083"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Alert - 'Packunwan' unwanted software was prevented - Mitre Techniques T1083
